channel.title: Solver AI Suite Status - Incident History

item.title: Audience Studio is down for some customers
item.content:encoded:
[Low] - Audience Studio Issue Summary: The incident with Audience Studio has been identified and fixed. Audience Studio is now fully operable.

Jul 29, 09:46 CEST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Audience Studio is fully operable now.

Jul 29, 08:25 CEST
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
